channel.title: Tops on Lebtag's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Lebtag's Blog

item.description: Hi, My name is Bruno Gabriel Lebtag Lebtag. I am a Brazilian Computer Scientist and Light Novelist. I am also a fluent English speaker. I started coding with 16 years and since then I couldn’t stop anymore. I love what I do and I can’t picture myself being or doing anything else. I consider myself a polyglot and polymath. I am currently learning german (although I can’t speak yet) and I’m also taking a Master’s in Software Architecture.
